item.title: SR-71 - Right Now
item.description:
작사: Mitch Allan, Greg Walker
KY: 60671 / KY: 21256

She clings to me
like cellophane
Fake plastic
submarine
Slowly driving
me insane
But now
that’s over
So what if the
sex was great
Just a temporary
escape
Another thing
I grew to hate
But now
that’s over
Why why you always
kick me when I’m
High knock me down
till we see eye to
Eye figured her
out I know she
May not be
Miss Right but
She’ll do right now
she’ll do right now
I used to hang on
every word
Each lie was
more absurd
Kept me so insecure
but now that’s over
She taught me
how to trust
And to believe
in us
And then
she taught me
How to cuss that
bitch it’s over
You Know I used to be
such a nice boy
Why why you always
kick me when I’m
High knock me down
till we see eye to
Eye figured her out
I know she
May not be
Miss Right but
She’ll do
right now

She clings to me
like cellophane
Fake plastic
submarine
She’s driving
me insane
But now
that’s over
Why why you always
kick me when I’m
High knock me down
till we see eye to
Eye figured her out
I know she
May not be
Miss Right but
She’ll do right now
she’ll do right now
Right now oh
right now
